title: 赏金已给出，求一个1.9以上的星球大战mod
author: Force_block
txt_content: 如题，本人是星战迷嘛。。。不要1.7和1.8的。。。这俩版本的我也有

replies.author: 天蝎_心殇
replies.txt_content:
1.9的还没有出啊
我刚刚去原帖看了一下，最高版本好像就1.7.10
官网：
http://www.planetminecraft.com/mod/the-starwars-mod-v10/

而且我注意到这样一句话
Not really, when I'm close to a finished project with RCM i'll update all mods to 1.8/1.9 and this mod along with RCM will be updated frequently (that is the plan)
意思差不多就是当项目接近尾声时，作者会把它更新到1.8/1.9，耐心等待吧

replies.txt_content:
